# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This reference book is a collection of insights about the expressed IGHV genes in B cell repertoires, collected from several studies. The book showcases the dynamics between the known and novel alleles and offers a new way of inferring genotypes from expressed repertoires sequencing data.

**Please note that this is the beta version and it will keep updating**
